artificial.neural.networks

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • artificial.neural.networks.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates the methods needed to run an MLP

    • Method Detail

      • run

        Matrix run(Matrix inputs,
           boolean onehot)
        Runs a single instance of input through the MLP
        Parameters:
        inputs - a row matrix having the input values
        onehot - decides whether the output is to be rounded to high and low or not
        Returns:
        returns the output matrix

      • test

        double test(Matrix inputs,
            Matrix outputs)
        Tests the given data on the MLP and returns the accuracy produced
        Parameters:
        inputs - the matrix of the input vectors
        outputs - the matrix of the expected output vectors
        Returns:
        the accuracy percentage
